publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-645 Nicola Sturgeon: Proceeds of Crime Act 2002-That the Parliament believes that all money recovered in Scotland under the Proceeds of Crime Act 2002 should be retained in Scotland and calls on the Scottish Executive to make urgent representations on this matter to Her Majesty's Government.
S2M-645 Proceeds of Crime Act 2002 (lodged on 21 November 2003) Ms Sandra White*, Fiona Hyslop*
S2M-645 Proceeds of Crime Act 2002 (lodged on 21 November 2003) Mr Adam Ingram*, Michael Matheson*
S2M-645 Proceeds of Crime Act 2002 (lodged on 21 November 2003) Alasdair Morgan*
S2M-645 Proceeds of Crime Act 2002 (lodged on 21 November 2003) Christine Grahame*
S2M-645 Proceeds of Crime Act 2002 (lodged on 21 November 2003) Mr Stewart Maxwell*
S2M-645 Proceeds of Crime Act 2002 (lodged on 21 November 2003) Brian Adam*
S2M-645 Proceeds of Crime Act 2002 (lodged on 21 November 2003) Mr Kenny MacAskill*
S2M-645 Proceeds of Crime Act 2002 (lodged on 21 November 2003) John Swinburne*
